teaser: The Digital Public Library of America goes online today, with 2.4 million pieces of art and history. As Union Pacific reports earnings, we count what's in their freight cars.What's next for Venezeula? And a long standing real estate term gets a makeover.
byline: Rob Schmitz, Peter O'Dowd, David Brancaccio, Amy Scott, Jeremy Hobson, Scott Tong, Sara Evans and Diane Swonk
title: Marketplace Morning Report for Thursday, April 18, 2013
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Thursday, April 18, 2013
description: The Digital Public Library of America goes online today, with 2.4 million pieces of art and history. As Union Pacific reports earnings, we count what's in their freight cars.What's next for Venezeula? And a long standing real estate term gets a makeover.
